alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 5:41PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, South Central Highlands, Upper Tularosa Valley, Guadalupe County, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust may create reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; Upper Tularosa Valley
